author: John Cross
title: Dimitri Payet set to fly to Marseille this weekend - and doesn't want to return to England
text:
Payet has told the Hammers he faces a family crisis (Photo: West Ham United via Getty Images) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Dimitri Payet plans to fly to Marseille this weekend – and does not want to come back to England. 
Payet is desperate to force a return to his former club and told West Ham he faces a family crisis. 
His wife Ludivine is determined to raise their three children in France and the £125,000-a-week midfielder told pals he is travelling home and is not sure when he will return, as the saga threatens to turn really nasty. 
West Ham believe suggestions Marseille have abandoned attempts to sign the France international this month is a bluff and are considering reporting them to FIFA, alleging the player was tapped-up. 
They insist they will not sell in January but Payet is becoming increasingly desperate to move. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
